item.title: Video Editor for Youtube Channel on Survivalism - Upwork
item.description:
Video editor for a survivalism Youtube channel.

Video style will be a combination of the two videos
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYcPYbAywDc
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-pDnhxreWk4

Videos will be 15-25 minutes long
Clips and voice over will be provided with the script
Looking for 5-6 videos over the next few weeks. Proposal price is per video

We are looking for someone with the following requirements:
1. Fast turn around time 24-48 hours
2. Fast response times
3. Good understanding of storytelling and Youtube retention.



Budget: $75
Posted On: June 30, 2024 23:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editor for Social Media Short Form Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Video Editor to join our team and create engaging short form content for social media platforms like Instagram reels, TikTok, and YouTube shorts. Your main responsibility will be to clip up raw material provided by influencers and transform it into visually appealing and attention-grabbing videos. As the Video Editor, you should have a strong understanding of the different requirements and formats for each platform.

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Capcut)
    - Ability to edit videos to match the style and tone of the influencer's brand
    - Knowledge of current trends and best practices for social media video content ***
    - Strong attention to detail and excellent time management skills

    This is a longterm partnership. We are seeking an intermediate-level Video Editor who has experience working on social media content. If you are passionate about creating engaging videos for popular social media platforms, as well as keeping up with viral trends, we'd love to hear from you!


Posted On: June 30, 2024 22:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Content Writing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Content Writing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Tiktok Reels Editing - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a short-form video editor who specializes in TikTok and IG Reels and is proficient in using CapCut. Motion graphic or graphic design skills are definitely a plus. This is a long-term project as we are a marketing agency with a constant need for editing this type of content.

If anyone is interested and excels at editing, please let me know. Additionally, if the person can assist with brainstorming and storyboarding, that would be a significant advantage!

Hourly Range: $8.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 22:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video, CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: TikTok Video, CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hey!

I am looking for someone who can:

- Edit videos for IG, Facebook, TikTok and YouTube

- Adjusting the color on videos and photos is a must

- Edit highlight videos and sizzle reels

The right candidate will be very creative and have experience with creating content for all of the above social media platforms.

Please share a link to your portfolio when you apply and add your bid for editing a single video. Thank you in advance!

Hourly Range: $3.00-$6.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 22:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Communications, Facebook
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Communications, Facebook
Country: United States
click to apply
